description:
This weekly podcast series is your audio guide to the most fascinating and fun revelations, reports, and studies on the internet. Quick, concise, and infectiously entertaining, This Week I Learned promises to make learning fun again.

New episodes: every Friday.
title: This Week I Learned

episodes.title: Ep. 79: This week I learned that crows make up after fights, and more
episodes.description: Considerate crows | The Vatican's milky walls | When Iceland's women went on strike | Mountain-climbing madness

episodes.title: Ep. 78: The week I learned your ice is teeming with bacteria, and more
episodes.description: Your gross ice | Play Super Mario with Grandma | The Eiffel Tower at night | Our forcefield atmosphere

episodes.title: Ep. 77: This week I learned dogs really are smarter than cats, and more
episodes.description: Dogs are nerds |  The trick to learning new skills | The great Halifax explosion | Pumice stones for whales

episodes.title: Ep. 76: This week I learned that prehistoric women were ridiculously strong, and more
episodes.description: Prehistoric girl power | Turtles' butt-breathing power | How cuddling changes genetics | The negative power of perception

episodes.title: Ep. 75: This week I learned America really struggled to pin down a date for Thanksgiving, and more
episodes.description: America's Thanksgiving indecision | The long history of the wishbone | Your gluten-less gluten sensitivity | A primer on naming countries

episodes.title: Ep. 74: This week I learned the dinosaurs could still be alive today if the asteroid had hit pretty much anywhere else, and more
episodes.description: How the dinosaurs could have survived | The healing powers of daytime | The room in your house that bugs prefer | The incredible efficiency of the penguin waddle

episodes.title: Ep. 73: This week I learned that dogs can smell happiness, and more
episodes.description: How you're hijacking your dog's emotions | Right-handed bees | Chopin's pickled heart | England's sin-eaters

episodes.title: Ep. 72: This week I learned plants can smell predators coming, and more
episodes.description: Plants can smell | Bacteria can feel | It snows sunscreen on a planet far, far away | The purpose of those silly little T. Rex arms

episodes.title: Ep. 71: This week I learned that salmon sex literally moves mountains, and more
episodes.description: Earth-shattering salmon love | The secret genius of daydreaming | Our innate arachnophobia | Diagnosed with a broken heart

episodes.title: Ep. 70: This week I learned worms can smell danger, and more
episodes.description: The olfactory defenses of the roundworm | Stress is ruining your diet | A fish's lament | The murderer behind the OED

episodes.title: Ep. 69: This week I learned how female dolphins are weaponizing their vaginas to fight the underwater patriarchy, and more
episodes.description: How dolphins fight 'the man' | Beware the nocebo effect | The mystery of the Amber Room | Europe's radioactive pigs problem

episodes.title: Ep. 68: This week I learned spoilers can actually make a story better, and more
episodes.description: Embrace the spoiler | Your parents' gender bias | Why clowns creep us out | How stress impairs

episodes.title: Ep. 67: This week I learned a good mood can make the flu vaccine more effective, and more
episodes.description: Happiness, the flu, and you | Which personality are you, cat? | The dinosaur-devouring frog | The bizarre aero-cure of the 1920s

episodes.title: Ep. 66: This week I learned you should absolutely beat yourself up a little the next time you fail, and more
episodes.description: The emotional trick to dealing with failure | Lightning-inducing cargo ships | The evolution of the giraffe's long neck | The Alaskan town overrun by bald eagles

episodes.title: Ep. 65: This week I learned the science behind out-of-body experiences, and more
episodes.description: The science of OBEs | The plastic inside us | All hail Viking warrior princesses! | Chocolate's dark medicinal history

episodes.title: Ep. 64: This week I learned your unfulfilled coffee craving is wreaking havoc with your memory, and more
episodes.description: The power of a coffee craving | Swordfish heat their eyeballs | Wild dogs' democratic sneezing fit | Haagen-Dazs’ New York origins

episodes.title: Ep. 63: This week I learned the beloved starfish is a surprisingly brutal killer, and more
episodes.description: The murderous starfish |  The color of breakfast | Our drug-addicted fish | A musical medical miracle

episodes.title: Ep. 62: This week I learned our brains can predict the future, and more
episodes.description: Your clairvoyant brain | Live in the moment: take photos! | The quest for space bread | The venom that broke the mold

episodes.title: Ep. 61: This week I learned late-night snacking might make you more prone to sunburns, and more
episodes.description: Midnight snacking and sunburns | Why we hold babies on the left | Disney’s propaganda machine | The science of sound underwater

episodes.title: Ep. 60: This week I learned it might be possible to learn while you sleep, and more
episodes.description: Finally, sleep-learning! | Your impeccably organized taste system | Brilliant bees | When athletes used cocaine to train

episodes.title: Ep. 59: This week I learned the only way to use your phone at night without messing with your sleep, and more
episodes.description: Blue-blockers for smartphone addicts | Jimmy wants to lower Jimmy's stress | Who's the boss? Baby knows. | The great Mona Lisa heist of 1911

episodes.title: Ep. 58: This week I learned why so many people order tomato juice on airplanes, and more
episodes.description: The science of bad airplane food | Why you're such a mosquito magnet | Ban soap! | The shy shark

episodes.title: Ep. 57: This week I learned what it would take to obliterate all life on Earth, and more
episodes.description: The surprising resilience of life | Jane Austen, home brewer | You're junk, DNA | The mind-cleansing effect of showering

episodes.title: Ep. 56: This week I learned praying mantises are killing your hummingbirds and eating their brains, and more
episodes.description: Praying mantises go for the brain | Frogs have ridiculously soft tongues | The 'poorly sleeping grandparent hypothesis' | Coral's magnificent protective glow

episodes.title: Ep. 55: This week I learned even smelling your food can make you fat, and more
episodes.description: How smell affects your weight | The memory boost of forgetfulness | Frogs, evolutionary opportunists | The inspiring fiction of Betty Crocker

episodes.title: Ep. 54: This week I learned just having your phone nearby is making you dumber, and more
episodes.description: The smartphone brain drain | The funky thing blinking does to your brain | The sisterhood of traveling vampire bats  | How a California mailman gave us avocados

episodes.title: Ep. 53: This week I learned that looking at puppies can save your marriage, and more
episodes.description: An excuse to look at puppies! | Heat-related airplane delays | The sea’s paragon of parenting | The most spectacular migration on Earth

episodes.title: Ep. 52: This week I learned that a low-carb diet may be changing your personality, and more
episodes.description: New diet, new you | Spain's time-zone woes | The mysteriously flexible pine trees  | The dark origin of the word 'gypped'

episodes.title: Ep. 51: This week I learned the dark origin story of the seat belt, and more
episodes.description: Hugh DeHaven was obsessed with accidents | A raven's revenge | The better, simpler way to wash your hands

episodes.title: Ep. 50: This week I learned flight times are longer now than they were 50 years ago, and more
episodes.description: Airline regress | Rainmaking fungi | Semantic satiation | The spider web that gets stronger the more it kills

episodes.title: Ep. 49: This week I learned how the world's hottest chili would kill you, and more
episodes.description: Don't eat the Dragon's Breath |  Your cannibalistic brain | Oral Allergy Syndrome! | How flamingos balance

episodes.title: Ep. 48: This week I learned about a 'zombie madness' that consumed medieval English villagers, and more
episodes.description: Medieval 'zombie madness' | The powers of happy memory | The bizarre breastfeeding habits of orangutans | The twisted origins of dentistry

episodes.title: Ep. 47: This week I learned smiling actually makes you look older, and more
episodes.description: The fairest expression of them all | Language is a time warp | The lady pirates of the 18th century | The brain-breaking regularity of stripes

episodes.title: Ep. 46: This week I learned squirrels were once America's most beloved pet, and more
episodes.description: The beloved pet squirrel | Ban workplace complaining | Astronauts with nothing to wear | Why we prune in the bath

episodes.title: Ep. 45: This week I learned female dragonflies will fake death to avoid male suitors, and more
episodes.description: How female dragonflies escape male suitors | Believing your broken heart better | Your dog feels you | Meet the space phenomenon called 'Steve'

episodes.title: Ep. 44: This week I learned United once offered men-only flights complete with 'manly' services, and more
episodes.description: Flying the 'club in the sky' |  The evolution of expression | The Synalpheus pinkfloydi | The mystery of the 'Tsavo Two'

episodes.title: Ep. 43: This week I learned you're tying your shoes wrong, and more
episodes.description: How to tie your shoes | SCOTUS hazing | The 1993 pantsuit revolution | Get your baby a dog

episodes.title: Ep. 42: This week I learned how Las Vegas once cashed in on 'atomic tourism,' and more
episodes.description: Las Vegas' 'atomic tourism' | Why we lose sleep as we age | The cost of intelligence in the wild | One is the loneliest cold

episodes.title: Ep. 41: This week I learned that sleep walking is an evolutionary trait gone terribly wrong, and more
episodes.description: The ancient origins of sleep walking | The spinach heart | A woman's right to go by her own name | The two faces of the smiley emoji

episodes.title: Ep. 40: This week I learned the word pink used to mean yellow, and more
episodes.description: Pink’s murky origins  | Our wide-eyed transition from water to land | The super blind mind | The ever mischievous Jane Austen

episodes.title: Ep. 39: This week I learned some metals have memory, and more
episodes.description: Metal memory | Living the slow life history strategy | Your dog, the liar | Why we itch

episodes.title: 38: This week I learned you could probably outrun a T. Rex, and more
episodes.description: Rex, speed walker | Forever-young ants | Tattoos for health? | The sad truth about seltzer

episodes.description: How an asteroid takes us down | The revolting necessity of vultures | That "grima" feeling | Sleepless in the Serengeti

episodes.title: Ep. 36: This week I learned why we're all suckers for the good cop/bad cop routine, and more
episodes.description: The emotional seesaw phenomenon | Fatherhood hormones | How fish "talk" | Introducing: Zealandia!

episodes.title: Ep. 35: This week I learned honeybees say 'oops' when they're startled, and more
episodes.description: Decoding clumsy bees | Your morning cup of memory boost | Goat BFFs | Panda diplomacy

episodes.title: Ep. 34: This week I learned that Brazil and France almost went to war over lobster, and more
episodes.description: The Lobster War | The efficiency of right-hand loops | How whales yell | Lunar hay fever

episodes.title: Ep. 33: This week I learned dogs dig reggae, and more
episodes.description: Music fit for a dog | A plant's smelly defense | Our terrifying ancestors | The mystery of synched pendulums

episodes.title: Ep. 32: This week I learned ancient otters were terrifyingly huge, and more
episodes.description: Wolf-sized otters | How nicotine calms a schizophrenic brain | The real power of ritual | Where the Declaration of Independence safely sleeps

episodes.title: Ep. 31: This week I learned the CIA once hired psychics for intelligence gathering, and more
episodes.description: Program Star Gate | Human-hunting vampire bats | Leonie, the asexual zebra shark mom | The dinosaurs' cold, dark death

episodes.title: Ep. 30: This week I learned your appendix might be useful after all, and more
episodes.description: Your hard-working appendix | Cramming for exercise | The end of the Megalodon shark | Baby talk and your dog

episodes.title: Ep. 29: This week I learned how fake news can be good for your brain, and more
episodes.description: A benefit to fake news | Dinosaur eggs and doom | The perils of cotton swabs | Your filthy money

episodes.title: Ep. 28: This week I learned 1 in 8 people is carrying around remnants of a twin consumed in the womb, and more
episodes.description: The vanishing twins phenomenon | Garlic-enhanced BO | Who sells seashells by the seashore? | The scientific curiosity of reindeer eyes

episodes.title: Ep. 27: This week I learned cavemen brushed their teeth, and more

episodes.title: Ep. 26: This week I learned how to tell if a rat is smiling, and more
episodes.description: How rat smile | Is man-flu real? | How sleep hard-wires negative thoughts | Movie set snow of the 1940s

episodes.title: Ep. 25: This week I learned plants can be conditioned just like Pavlov's dog, and more
episodes.description: Pavlov's plant | The sad evolution of tuskless elephants | Sleep deprivation can lift depression | Your joyless MP3s

episodes.description: Your brain on God | The complex memory of dogs | Spider daddy issues | The rule of re-freezing food

episodes.description: The origins of the telephone greeting | The hijacking effects of eye contact | The other Gettysburg Address | The only government agency with a catchy theme song

episodes.title: Ep. 22: This week I learned Australia wiggles back and forth, pigs can be optimists, and more
episodes.description: Australia's seasonal dance | A pigpen, half full | George Washington's herculean immune system | A brief history of "baby shows"

episodes.title: Ep. 21: This week I learned there's a bright side to the gripping fear of death, and more
episodes.description: A fear of death is good for you | Stop washing your office coffee mug | The science behind a lump in your throat | The envious work-life balance of medieval peasants

episodes.title: Ep. 18: This week I learned fish have accents, and more
episodes.description: The particular sadness of fish dialects | Relieve an itch with trickery | Don't refrigerate tomatoes | The Donald Trump of the 1800s

episodes.description: Everyday radiation | Embracing your middle name | The dark origins of the Nobel Prizes | The jiu jitsu-fighting suffragettes

episodes.description: Dogs sense time through smell | The life-extending effects of humor | Easing regret through temperature | The pineapple's luxe history

episodes.description: Dogs are practical learners | Good news for acne sufferers | The health boosts of a happy spouse | Pureed pumpkin is a lie
